parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPS system can cause a sudden loss of power-assisted steering, making it extremely difficult to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The EPS light on the dashboard illuminates
extreme force is required to steer the vehicle
the steering wheel becomes very hard to turn
the vehicle is difficult to control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the starter motor can cause the vehicle to fail to start, leaving the driver stranded and potentially causing safety issues.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or fails to start when cold
the starter motor throws out the pinion but fails to engage the flywheel and crank the motor
the starter motor fails to start the car intermittently
and the failure worsens over time.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the starter motor can cause difficulty or inability to start the engine, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks, especially in emergency situations.
symptoms: Strange grinding noise coming from the starter
intermittent failure to start the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gear shifter box can cause difficulty or inability to shift gears, leading to loss of vehicle control and potential accidents.
symptoms: strange noises or vibrations when shifting gears.
